Uses of Class
nachos.threads.Scheduler

  • Packages that use Scheduler 
    Package Description
    nachos.threads
    Provides classes that support a multithreaded kernel.

    • Uses of Scheduler in nachos.threads

      Subclasses of Scheduler in nachos.threads 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LotteryScheduler
      A scheduler that chooses threads using a lottery.
      class  PriorityScheduler
      A scheduler that chooses threads based on their priorities.
      class  RoundRobinScheduler
      A round-robin scheduler tracks waiting threads in FIFO queues, implemented with linked lists.
      Fields in nachos.threads declared as Scheduler 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Scheduler ThreadedKernel.scheduler
      Globally accessible reference to the scheduler.
